infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: nChat needs camera access to take photos and videos for messaging
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: nChat needs photo library access to share photos and videos
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: nChat needs permission to save photos and videos to your library
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: nChat needs microphone access for voice messages and calls
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: nChat uses Face ID for secure authentication
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: nChat needs location access to share your location
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: nChat needs contacts access to help you find friends
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: nChat needs calendar access to schedule meetings
